price: Ta l’ó dára ní ẹ̀sìn ju ẹni tí ó jura rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ fún Allāhu, olùṣe-rere sì tún ni, ó tún tẹ̀lé ẹ̀sìn (Ànábì) ’Ibrọ̄hīm, olùdúró-déédé-nínú-’Islām? Allāhu sì mú (Ànábì) ’Ibrọ̄hīm ní àyànfẹ́.
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ دِينٗا مِّمَّنۡ أَسۡلَمَ وَجۡهَهُۥ لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ وَٱتَّبَعَ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۗ وَٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waman aḥsanu dīnan mimman aslama wajhahu lillahi wahuwa muḥ'sinun wa-ittabaʿa millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wa-ittakhadha al-lahu ib'rāhīma khalīlan
